info.description: This is a REST API for the RyftOne Server and Cluster. It provides methods to list files and folders stored on server or cluster and execute search and count requests. Both RAW_TEXT and RECORD searches supported. Please explore API below for details and examples.
info.title: RyftOne REST API

get.description: Endpoint for the search. Does the text or structured search.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query, for example: (RAW_TEXT CONTAINS "night")

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Set of files or catalogs to search. The path should be designated relative to /ryftone. Wildcards are supported, for example: *.txt

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Search mode. Could be exact search (es), fuzzy hamming search (fhs), fuzzy edit distance search (feds), date search (ds), time search (ts), currency or numeric search (ns), regex search (rs), IPv4 search (ipv4), IPv6 search (ipv6)

parameters.name: surrounding
parameters.description: Number of characters before the match and after the match that will be returned. This parameter is used with RAW text search

parameters.name: fuzziness
parameters.description: Fuzziness of the search. Measured as the maximum Hamming distance for "fhs" mode or edit distance for "feds" mode.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Input data format. Parameter is used with structured or RAW text search.

parameters.name: cs
parameters.description: Case sensitive flag

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Coma-separated list of requested fields. If omitted all fields are used. Parameter is used with structured search to minimize output.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Name of data file to keep. WARNING: file will be overriden!

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Name of index file to keep. WARNING: file will be overriden!

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: The delimiter is used between found records in DATA file.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Specifies 1-4 RCAB processing nodes to use. If omitted all nodes are used.

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Perform search only on this cluster member. Default 'false'.

parameters.name: stats
parameters.description: Include search statistics in response. Default 'false'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the total number of records reported.

200.description: SearchResponseOK is a search result in an array with an elements of various structure

get.description: Endpoint to query node/cluster file system structure

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: The folder path to return child items of. Default '/'

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Return file structure from local node only or whole cluster

200.description: List of files and directories for node/cluster

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The uploading filename. Use {{random}} for random names.

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: The catalog to append file to.

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: The delimiter is used between file parts in catalog.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The optional file part offset.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The optional file part length.

parameters.name: lifetime
parameters.description: The file or catalog lifetime, for example '2h'.

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Perform action only on this cluster member. Default 'false'.

200.description: Map of files and directories deleted

delete.description: Endpoint to delete node's directories and files

parameters.name: dir
parameters.description: The directory path to delete. Wildcards are supported.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file path to delete. Wildcards are supported.

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: The catalog path to delete. Wildcards are supported.

200.description: Map of files and directories deleted
